amendment.description: To increase funding for immunization services.

action.text: Amendment SA 1592 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1592 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 49. Record Vote Number: 337.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1592 made in Senate.
Point of order under the Budget Act raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1592.
Amendment SA 1592 proposed by Senator Reed to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR S11231-11232; text: CR S11231) To increase funding for immunization services.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1592 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 49. Record Vote Number: 337.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1592 proposed by Senator Reed to Amendment SA 1542.
